Option.Name: Damage Level Change before Poise Break
Remove Effect If Torch In Hand
Scale Attack Power with Equip Load

iconId.Wiki: Icon that will appear below the player's healthbar when this effect is active

conditionHp.Wiki: SpEffect will not be applied until HP is at or below this threshold

motionInterval.Wiki: Amount of times the effect will be applied over it's duration, primarily used for healing or damage over time effects

physicsAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage, calculated after defense

magicAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage, calculated after defense

fireAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage, calculated after defense

thunderAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage, calculated after defense

physicsAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage, calculated before defense

magicAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage, calculated before defense

fireAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage, calculated before defense

thunderAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage, calculated before defense

physicsAttackPower.Wiki: Alters physical damage by a flat amount

magicAttackPower.Wiki: Alters magic damage by a flat amount

fireAttackPower.Wiki: Alters fire damage by a flat amount

thunderAttackPower.Wiki: Alters lightning damage by a flat amount

physicsDiffence.Wiki: Alters physical defense by a flat amount

magicDiffence.Wiki: Alters magic defense by a flat amount

fireDiffence.Wiki: Alters fire defense by a flat amount

thunderDiffence.Wiki: Alters lightning defense by a flat amount

NoGuardDamageRate.Wiki: Replace the damage multiplier at the time of opening with the set value (set on the damage side)

vitalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Alters the damage multiplier defined in Jumptable 42

normalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Alters the damage multiplier defined in Jumptable 59

maxHpChangeRate.Wiki: Increases or decreases maximum HP by the set multiplier

behaviorId.Wiki: Spawns the behavior referenced, requires stateInfo 275

changeHpRate.Wiki: Multiplies Hp over the duration of the effect

changeHpPoint.Wiki: Adds or removes Hp by a flat amount over the duration of the effect

changeMpRate.Wiki: Multiplies Fp/Mp over the duration of the effect

changeMpPoint.Wiki: Adds or removes Fp/Mp by a flat amount over the duration of the effect

mpRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Changes recovery speed. Add or subtract from the standard recovery speed and initial recovery speed in the recovery calculation formula.

changeStaminaRate.Wiki: Multiplies Posture over the duration of the effect

changeStaminaPoint.Wiki: Adds or removes Posture by a flat amount over the duration of the effect

staminaRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Alters Posture regen by a flat amount

magicEffectTimeChange.Wiki: For only spells whose effect duration is set to 0.1 seconds or more, add or subtract the time set to the effect duration.

poizonAttackPower.Wiki: Applies Poison build-up, only works with stateInfo 2

registIllness.Wiki: Applies Terror build-up, only works with stateInfo 5

registBlood.Wiki: Applies Burn build-up, only work with stateInfo 6

registCurse.Wiki: Applies Enfeeble build-up, only works with stateInfo 116

soulRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of Sen dropped by enemies, requires stateInfo 76 and only works when applied to the player

soul.Wiki: Adds or removes Sen from the player over the duration of the effect

animIdOffset.Wiki: Changes the animation category used, only for Npc's

haveSoulRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of Sen dropped by enemies, only works when applied to enemies

targetPriority.Wiki: Chance for an enemy to switch aggro targets to/away the effect's owner. Values range from -1 to 1. +1 = 100% chance to target owner instead of current target, -1 = 100% chance to target somebody else instead of current target (effect owner).

sightSearchEnemyCut.Wiki: Give it to someone who can see it. The viewer is more likely to be excluded from the AI's visual search target. 0 is default

aroundSightPointAddRate.Wiki: Give it to someone who can see it. Increase rate of discovery points accumulated in the viewer's peripheral vision

mapVisibilityOverrideGood.Wiki: When performing a lock judgment or AI visibility judgment, if the map visibility type of the hit where the target character is standing is 'good', replace it with this value before making the judgment.

mapVisibilityOverrideDark.Wiki: When performing lock judgment or AI visibility judgment, if the map visibility type of the hit where the target character is standing is 'darkness', replace it with this value before making the judgment.

mapVisibilityOverridePitchDark.Wiki: When performing lock judgment or AI visibility judgment, if the map visibility type of the hit where the target character is standing is 'pitch darkness', replace it with this value before making the judgment.

sightCutLimitType.Wiki: Give it to someone who can see it. Types of conditions under which the viewer's visual search cut is effective

hearingSearchEnemyRate.Wiki: Call the person who will listen. Multiplier of the sound radius generated by itself. 1 is the default

grabityRate.Wiki: Multiplies animation speed, only works in Dark Souls 1

soulStealRate.Wiki: Defense power against HP taken away from NPC by Soul Steal

hpRecoverRate.Wiki: Multiplies the Hp change in changeHpRate and changeHpPoint fields

replaceSpEffectId.Wiki: Applies speffect once the parent effect's duration has expired

cycleOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Applies speffect when the parent effect is active

atkOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Applies speffect when an attack connects, only one can be applied at any given time and only works with stateInfo 152, 153, 62, and 64

guardDefFlickPowerRate.Wiki: Repelling defense power correction value when guarding

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Stamina cut rate correction value when guarding

eyeAngUpper_Perceive.Wiki: Alters the upwards vision angle during a Combat AI state

eyeAngBottom_Perceive.Wiki: Alters the downwards vision angle during a Combat AI state

changeSuperArmorPoint.Wiki: Alters max super armor by a flat amount

bowDistRate.Wiki: Multiplies the attenuation range of bullets, requires stateInfo 168

categoryPriority.Wiki: Determines the priority of stacking behavior, effects with higher priority will not be removed when one with a lower priority is applied. lower number = higher priority

saveCategory.Wiki: Effect will not be removed when quitting the game, only one effect within each category can be saved

changeMagicSlot.Wiki: Alters the amount of sorcery slots the player has

changeMiracleSlot.Wiki: Alters the amount of miracle slots the player has

heroPointDamage.Wiki: Damage value given to humanity value

defFlickPower.Wiki: Set value to override repelling defense power

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Set value to override repelling defense power

dmgLv_None.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 0

dmgLv_S.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 1

dmgLv_M.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 2

dmgLv_L.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 3

dmgLv_BlowM.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 4

dmgLv_Push.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 5

dmgLv_Strike.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 6

dmgLv_BlowS.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 7

dmgLv_Min.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 8

dmgLv_Uppercut.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 9

dmgLv_BlowLL.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 10

dmgLv_Breath.Wiki: Determines what stagger animations play when recieving dmgLevel 11

atkAttribute.Wiki: Changes the damage type for physical damage

stateInfo.Wiki: Handles various hardcoded actions (not all stateInfos have hardcoded actions). Can also be used to apply conditional effects.

wepParamChange.Wiki: Determines whether or not the effect will target the left hand, right hand, or self

addBehaviorJudgeId_condition.Wiki: Condition value for adding value to behavior judgment ID (Default: -1)

dispIconNonactive.Wiki: Display the icon even when waiting for activation

useSpEffectEffect.Wiki: When enabled the effect will use the SpEffectVfxParam row with the same id as the stateInfo referenced in this effect

bGameClearBonus.Wiki: Only apply this effect in NG+ or higher

clearSoul.Wiki: The number of souls you have becomes 0

noDead.Wiki: Is it possible to become a corpse? If this is checked, you will not be in a dead state.

bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP.Wiki: When enabled and this effect alters max Hp, current Hp will be adjusted when max Hp is adjusted

corrosionIgnore.Wiki: [Status change type] ignores [durability] reduction due to [corrosion]

sightSearchCutIgnore.Wiki: Give it to the viewer. Ignore the visual search cut set for the viewer

hearingSearchCutIgnore.Wiki: Call to the listener. Ignore the auditory search cut set for the person being heard.

antiMagicIgnore.Wiki: Can use magic even in anti-magic range

grabityIgnore.Wiki: Ignore the speed changes from grabityRate

disablePoison.Wiki: Prevents Poison from being applied, stateInfo 2

disableDisease.Wiki: Prevents Terror from being applied, stateInfo 5

disableBlood.Wiki: Prevents Burn from being applied, stateInfo 6

disableCurse.Wiki: Prevents Enfeeble from being applied, stateInfo 116

enableLifeTime.Wiki: Will the lifespan be extended when flagging by TAE?

isFireDamageCancel.Wiki: Remove this effect once fire damage has been recieved

isExtendSpEffectLife.Wiki: When enabled this effect's duration will be affected by extendLifeRate

chargeAttackParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not to be effective against charged attacks.

throwAttackParamChange.Wiki: Set whether to have an effect on throwing attacks or not.

vowType0.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType1.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType2.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType3.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType4.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType5.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType6.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType7.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType8.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType9.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType10.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType11.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType12.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType13.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType14.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

vowType15.Wiki: Covenant categories, effect will not be applied to the player if they are in this Covenant and this field set to 0

repAtkDmgLv.Wiki: The damage level of the attacker will be changed to this value.

sightSearchRate.Wiki: Give it to the viewer. Multiply your own AI visual distance by the set magnification factor

changeTeamType.Wiki: Changes the team type of the enemy

dmypolyId.Wiki: Defines a dummypoly for a bullet to spawn from

vfxId.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

accumuOverFireId.Wiki: Applies speffect when the Accumulation value has reached or exceeded the value defined in accumuOverVal, only works with stateInfo 303-311

accumuOverVal.Wiki: Defines the value that needs to be met or exceeded in order to apply the speffect in accumuOverFireId, only works with stateInfo 303-311

accumuUnderFireId.Wiki: Applies speffect when the Accumulation value is below the value defined in accumuUnderVal, only works with stateInfo 303-311

accumuUnderVal.Wiki: Defines the value that needs to be less than the current Accumulation value in order to apply the speffect in accumuUnderFireId, only works with stateInfo 303-311

accumuVal.Wiki: Adds to the current Accumulation value when this effect is active, only works with stateInfo 303-311

hearingSearchEnemyCut.Wiki: Call to the listener. Magnification of the sound radius being generated. 0 is the default.

eyeAngLeft_Perceive.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the left during a Combat AI state

eyeAngRight_Perceive.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the right during a Combat AI state

addDeceasedLv.Wiki: Add this value to the degree of death

vfxId1.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId2.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId3.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId4.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId5.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId6.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

vfxId7.Wiki: Spawns a vfx that is defined in SpEffectVfxParam

registFreeze.Wiki: Applies Shock build-up, only works with stateInfo 260

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: Spawns an AI sound when the effect is active

weakDmgRateA.Wiki: Alters damage against Type A enemies

weakDmgRateB.Wiki: Alters damage against Type B enemies

weakDmgRateC.Wiki: Alters damage against Type C enemies

weakDmgRateD.Wiki: Alters damage against Type D enemies

weakDmgRateE.Wiki: Alters damage against Type E enemies

weakDmgRateF.Wiki: Alters damage against Type F enemies

darkDiffence.Wiki: Alters dark defense by a flat amount

darkAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies dark damage, calculated after defense

darkAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies dark damage, calculated before defense

darkAttackPower.Wiki: Alters dark damage by a flat amount

antiDarkSightRadius.Wiki: Darkness radius [m]. If you are within this distance, you will be able to see at normal distance even in dark places.

antiDarkSightDmypolyId.Wiki: Damipoly ID (-1: Master) that can be seen completely in the dark. Create a fully visible area around this dummy poly

conditionHpRate.Wiki: SpEffect will not be applied until Hp is at or above this threshold

itemDropRate.Wiki: Multiplies the drop rate of items, requires stateInfo 66

hearingSearchRate.Wiki: Multiply the AI ​​hearing distance by the set magnification factor

changePoisonResistPoint.Wiki: Alters Poison resistance by a flat amount

changeDiseaseResistPoint.Wiki: Alters Terror resistance by a flat amount

changeBloodResistPoint.Wiki: Alters Burn resistance by a flat amount

changeCurseResistPoint.Wiki: Alters Enfeeble resistance by a flat amount

changeFreezeResistPoint.Wiki: Alters Shock resistance by a flat amount

slashAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies slash damage, calculated after defense

lightHitAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies light hit damage, calculated after defense

thrustAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies thrust damage, calculated after defense

neutralAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies neutral damage, calculated after defense

slashAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies slash damage, calculated before defense

lightHitAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies light hit damage, calculated before defense

thrustAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies thrust damage, calculated before defense

neutralAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies neutral damage, calculated before defense

slashAttackPower.Wiki: Alters slash damage by a flat amount

lightHitAttackPower.Wiki: Alters light hit damage by a flat amount

thrustAttackPower.Wiki: Alters thrust damage by a flat amount

neutralAttackPower.Wiki: Alters neutral damage by a flat amount

overrideThrowTypeId.Wiki: Replace with this type ID when throwing normally. SEQ00005 [Throwing system] Change the normal throw (PC) that is executed depending on the special effect

sightSearchLeftAngleCut.Wiki: Shrinks enemy vision cone facing left

sightSearchRightAngleCut.Wiki: Shrinks enemy vision cone facing right

sightSearchUpperAngleCut.Wiki: Shrinks enemy vision cone facing up

sightSearchBottomAngleCut.Wiki: Shrinks enemy vision cone facing down

eyeAngUpper.Wiki: Alters the upwards vision angle during a Normal AI state

eyeAngBottom.Wiki: Alters the downwards vision angle during a Normal AI state

eyeAngLeft.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the left during a Normal AI state

eyeAngRight.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the right during a Normal AI state

wetConditionType.Wiki: Types of wet appearance. Used for calculating decal IDs, etc.

disableFreeze.Wiki: Prevents Shock from being applied, stateInfo 260

isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: When this field is enabled and this effect applies status build-up, the status build-up will change based on the status multiplier in AtkParam

isUseAtkParamAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: When this field is enabled and this effect deals flat damage, the damage will affected by attack multipliers in AtkParam

isContractSpEffectLife.Wiki: When enabled the effects duration will be altered by contractLifeRate

isWaitModeDelete.Wiki: Allows effects with a stateInfo condition to run out naturally without the stateInfo present

isIgnoreNoDamage.Wiki: Invinsibility frames will not affect this SpEffect

isDisableNetSync.Wiki: Does not sync online. This does not mean that it will be applied locally, but simply that it will not be sent over the internet. For example, remote characters do not activate locally, so nothing will happen in that case.

eyeAngUpper_Around.Wiki: Alters the upwards vision angle during a Caution AI state

eyeAngBottom_Around.Wiki: Alters the downwards vision angle during a Caution AI state

saReceiveDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of super damage taken

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Multiplies physical defense against the player only

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Multiplies magic defense against the player only

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Multiplies fire defense against the player only

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Multiplies lightning defense against the player only

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Multiplies dark defense against the player only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Multiplies physical defense against Npc's only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Multiplies magic defense against Npc's only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Multiplies fire defense against Npc's only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Multiplies lightning defense against Npc's only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Multiplies dark defense against Npc's only

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage for the player only, calculated before defense

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage for the player only, calculated before defense

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage for the player only, calculated before defense

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage for the player only, calculated before defense

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Multiplies dark damage for the player only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage for Npc's only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage for Npc's only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage for Npc's only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage for Npc's only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Multiplies dark damage for Npc's only, calculated before defense

invocationConditionsStateChange1.Wiki: StateInfo that is required for this effect to apply

invocationConditionsStateChange2.Wiki: StateInfo that is required for this effect to apply

invocationConditionsStateChange3.Wiki: StateInfo that is required for this effect to apply

dexterityCancelSystemOnlyAddDexterity.Wiki: Add this value when calculating the end timing of the TAE flag for 'skill cancel'

artsConsumptionRate.Wiki: Multiplies Fp cost of weapon arts

changeHpEstusFlaskRate.Wiki: Multiplies Hp change, the change rate can be adjusted by changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate

changeHpEstusFlaskPoint.Wiki: Alters Hp change by a flat amount, the change rate can be adjusted by changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate

changeMpEstusFlaskRate.Wiki: Multiplies Mp change, the change rate can be adjusted by changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate

changeMpEstusFlaskPoint.Wiki: Alters Mp change by a flat amount, the change rate can be adjusted by changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate

changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate.Wiki: Multiplies the Hp change of the changeHpEstusFlaskRate and changeHpEstusFlaskPoint fields

changeMpEstusFlaskCorrectRate.Wiki: Multiplies the Mp change of the changeMpEstusFlaskRate and changeMpEstusFlaskPoint fields

applyIdOnGetSoul.Wiki: Applies speffect when enemies die, requires stateInfo 199 and the enemy must drop Souls

extendLifeRate.Wiki: Increases the duration of speffects with isExtendSpEffectLife enabled

contractLifeRate.Wiki: Decreases the duration of speffects with isContractSpEffectLife enabled

effectEndDeleteDecalGroupId.Wiki: Will remove the decal with the same GroupId if the DecalGroupId is not applied

defObjectAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Corrects attack power for damage received from OBJ. (Not damage compensation)

staminaPhysicsAttribute.Wiki: Changes the damage type for posture damage

defLightHitStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies light hit posture damage recived

defHeavyHitStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies heavy hit posture damage recived

defAntiGroundStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti ground posture damage recived

defAntiAirStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti air posture damage recived

defLightShootStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies light shoot posture damage recived

atkNinsatsuDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies ninsatsu damage, calculated after defense

atkHeavyHitDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies heavy hit damage, calculated after defense

atkAntiGroundDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti ground damage, calculated after defense

atkAntiAirDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti air damage, calculated after defense

atkLightShootDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies light shoot damage, calculated after defense

ninsatsuAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies ninsatsu damage, calculated before defense

heavyHitAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies heavy hit damage, calculated before defense

antiGroundAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti ground damage, calculated before defense

antiAirAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies anti air damage, calculated before defense

lightShootAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies light shoot damage, calculated before defense

ninsatsuAttackPower.Wiki: Alters ninsatsu damage by a flat amount

heavyHitAttackPower.Wiki: Alters heavy hit damage by a flat amount

antiGroundAttackPower.Wiki: Alters anti ground damage by a flat amount

antiAirAttackPower.Wiki: Alters anti air damage by a flat amount

lightShootAttackPower.Wiki: Alters light shoot damage by a flat amount

agingFadeTime.Wiki: Amount of time to wait before replacing the current model with the aging model

maxHpIncrease.Wiki: Alters max Hp by a flat amount

maxSpIncrease.Wiki: Alters max Posture by a flat amount

counterSpEffectId.Wiki: SpEffect that will be applied to the attacker when hit with a hitbox that has the same counterSpEffectCondition as the one in this effect

counterSpEffectCondition.Wiki: Defines the condition that is required in order trigger the speffect in counterSpEffectId on the attacker

unlockThresholdCamouflage.Wiki: Alpha value that makes it impossible to lock while hidden

camouflageHitPartsGroup.Wiki: When receiving damage, regardless of the actual hit location, it is assumed that the damage was received at the location specified here, and the damage is reduced and the propagation rate is corrected depending on the location.

chrWireVariationNo.Wiki: Enables grappling to chr if effect is active. Disabled if set to -1

chrWireTargetDmypolyId.Wiki: Spawns a grapple UI symbol on the specified dummypoly

chrWireLandingPointDmypolyId.Wiki: Generate a landing point at the dummy poly position of this ID. -1 generates at the origin.

behaviorRefId.Wiki: References hks script directly to perform various actions

defPoisonResistDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount Poison status build-up recieved

defDiseaseResistDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount Terror status build-up recieved

defBloodResistDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount Burn status build-up recieved

defCurseResistDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount Enfeeble status build-up recieved

defFreezeResistDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount Shock status build-up recieved

defAttriAStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of Posture damage recieved from the AttriA posture damage type (atkAttribute 10)

defAttriBStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of Posture damage recieved from the AttriB posture damage type (atkAttribute 11)

defAttriCStaminaDmgRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of Posture damage recieved from the AttriC posture damage type (atkAttribute 12)

attriAAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute A damage, calculated after defense

attriBAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute B damage, calculated after defense

attriCAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute C damage, calculated after defense

attriAAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute A damage, calculated before defense

attriBAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute B damage, calculated before defense

attriCAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiplies attribute C damage, calculated before defense

attriAAttackPower.Wiki: Alters attribute A damage by a flat amount

attriBAttackPower.Wiki: Alters attribute B damage by a flat amount

attriCAttackPower.Wiki: Alters attribute C damage by a flat amount

attriADamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of damage recieved from the AttriA damage type

attriBDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of damage recieved from the AttriB damage type

attriCDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of damage recieved from the AttriC damage type

resourceItemDropRate.Wiki: Multiplies drop rate of Resource Item A, B, and C

revivalRecastDamage.Wiki: Removes black bar that disables Resurrections

haveSkillPointRate.Wiki: Multiplies XP drop rate from enemies, only works when applied to the enemy

skillPoint.Wiki: Awards XP to the player over the duration of the effect

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Stamina.Wiki: Multiplies posture damage against the player only, calculated before defense

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Stamina.Wiki: Multiplies posture damage against Npc's only, calculated before defense

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Stamina.Wiki: Multiplies posture defense against the player only

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Stamina.Wiki: Multiplies posture damage against Npc's only

eyeAngLeft_Around.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the left during a Caution AI state

eyeAngRight_Around.Wiki: Alters the vision angle to the right during a Caution AI state
